title: Healthcare Service
description: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:active.title: Active
fhir:active.description: This flag is used to mark the record to not be used. This is not used when a center is closed for maintenance, or for holidays, the notAvailable period is to be used for this.

xdm:providedBy.title: Provided By
xdm:providedBy.description: The organization that provides this service.

xdm:offeredIn.title: Offered In
xdm:offeredIn.description: When the HealthcareService is representing a specific, schedulable service, the availableIn property can refer to a generic service.

fhir:category.title: Category
fhir:category.description: Identifies the broad category of service being performed or delivered.

fhir:type.title: Type
fhir:type.description: The specific type of service that may be delivered or performed.

fhir:specialty.title: Specialty
fhir:specialty.description: Collection of specialties handled by the Healthcare service. This is more of a medical term.

fhir:location.title: Location
fhir:location.description: The location(s) where this healthcare service may be provided.

fhir:name.title: Name
fhir:name.description: Further description of the service as it would be presented to a consumer while searching.

fhir:comment.title: Comment
fhir:comment.description: Any additional description of the service and/or any specific issues not covered by the other attributes, which can be displayed as further detail under the serviceName.

fhir:extraDetails.title: Extra Details
fhir:extraDetails.description: Extra details about the service that can't be placed in the other fields.

fhir:contact.title: Contact
fhir:contact.description: The contact details of communication devices available relevant to the specific HealthcareService. This can include addresses, phone numbers, fax numbers, mobile numbers, email addresses and web sites.

fhir:coverageArea.title: Coverage Area
fhir:coverageArea.description: The location(s) that this service is available to (not where the service is provided).

fhir:serviceProvisionCode.title: Service Provision Code
fhir:serviceProvisionCode.description: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

fhir:eligibility.title: Eligibility
fhir:eligibility.description: Does this service have specific eligibility requirements that need to be met in order to use the service?

xdm:comment.title: Comment
xdm:comment.description: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service.

fhir:program.title: Program
fhir:program.description: Programs that this service is applicable to.

fhir:communication.title: Communication
fhir:communication.description: Some services are specifically made available in multiple languages, this property permits a directory to declare the languages this is offered in. Typically this is only provided where a service operates in communities with mixed languages used.

fhir:referralMethod.title: Referral Method
fhir:referralMethod.description: Ways that the service accepts referrals, if this is not provided then it is implied that no referral is required.

fhir:appointmentRequired.title: Appointment Required
fhir:appointmentRequired.description: Indicates whether or not a prospective consumer will require an appointment for a particular service at a site to be provided by the Organization. Indicates if an appointment is required for access to this service.

fhir:availability.title: Availability
fhir:availability.description: A collection of times that the healthcare service is available.

fhir:endpoint.title: Endpoint
fhir:endpoint.description: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the specific healthcare services defined at this resource.
